alert.note: Alert for Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:47AM EDT until June 14 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EDT FOR WICOMICO COUNTY... At 1047 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hebron, or near Salisbury, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Salisbury University and Delmar around 1055 AM EDT. Salisbury around 1100 AM EDT. Parsonsburg around 1110 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Green Hill, Catchpenny, Salisbury-Wicomico, Royal Oak, Willards, Lakewood, Mardela Springs, Chesapeake Heights, Pittsville and Powellville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
